reviewText: Great series, up there with NYPD Blue.

This is actually a Christmas gift for my Papa'. He has been talking about this series for years and how he enjoyed watching it with Mama; when she was alive. I thought I would get him this set to enjoy this winter....=)

Loved this series when it was on the air and have been unable to find reruns in recent years.  I have enjoyed seeing the series again from start to finish.  The dvds are excellent quality and the stories and characters are interesting and unique.

I watched this acclaimed TV series when first aired. After watching the series,The Wire, also set in Baltimore, decided to watch this one too. It was groundbreaking TV drama and holds up well after so many years.
